title: Patching to 5.17 error
body:
As I patch to 5.17 a bunch (4) of error windows open all saying "jpatch.exe has stopped working" and a window saying "The application was unable to start correctly (0xc0000005)".  The patcher will keep going in the background until getting stuck at 99%. [A person on euw seems to have a similar problem.](http://boards.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-en/ENYJW1wN-jpathcexe-error) 

I've attached an error report from the logs folder in case that may help.

I'd appreciate any help.

EDIT: I found [this post](http://boards.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-en/QcVrHbTg-jpatchexe-has-stopped-working-and-patcher-stuck-at-99-since-10-minutes) from about a month ago, and after following the advice given there the game patched and now everything works fine, does this topic need to be marked as resolved now or anything?
